instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00045 no keyboard
threads.message:
Hi Duke..
So I replaced the LCD today on the 2015 12in MacBook. Forgot to plug trackpad to motherboard in. Opened it and did it last however battery was still connected and I made smoke. Trackpad would then get really hot. And there was a burn mark on trackpad motherboard flex cable.
Took working trackpad and cable from working 12in and still no keyboard or trackpad working. 

Testing voltages at connector and i have the following 
ppbus g3h tpad flt - 8v
pp3v3 g3h kbd f - 3.3v
pp5v s0 kbd f - 5v
pp3v3 s4 tpad f - 3.3v

Any pointers here please?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00045 no keyboard
threads.message: FUCK!!!! Disregard this sorry. Made a fkn stupid mistake need to open my eyes and plug keyboard connector into keyboard for fuck sake.
